Set.～号・～ごう: counter for magazine; the name of ship

Set.以後・いご: after this; from now on; hereafter

Set.追いかける・おいかける: to chase or run after someone

Set.送り仮名・おくりがな: part of word written in kana

Set.お待たせしました・おまたせしました: Sorry to have kept you waiting

Set.おまちどおさま・おまちどおさま: Sorry to have kept you waiting

Set.思いっきり・おもいっきり: to the best of one's ability

Set.兼ねる・かねる: to simultaneously serve two or more functions

Set.構いません・かまいません: it's all right; one doesn’t mind

Set.削る・けずる: to cut down little by little

Set.ご苦労様・ごくろうさま: Thank you for your hard work

Set.こちらこそ・こちらこそ: it is I who should say so

Set.御無沙汰・ごぶさた: not writing or contacting for a while

Set.自宅・じたく: one's own home (same as 自分の家 (じぶんのいえ))

Set.親類・しんるい: relative(s) (same as 親戚 (しんせき))

Set.背負う・せおう: to be burdened with; to carry on (one's) back or shoulder(s)

Set.接する・せっする: to attend to (someone); to associate with

Set.ぜひとも・ぜひとも: by all means (with sense of not taking 'no' for an answer)

Set.溶け込む・とけこむ: to melt into; to become a part of

Set.殿・どの: Mister (mostly in addressing someone on an envelope)

Set.挟む・はさむ: to pinch; to hold between; to insert

Set.発想・はっそう: idea; way of thinking (same as 考え方 (かんがえかた))

Set.見送る・みおくる: to see off; to escort; to let pass

Set.盛る・もる: to serve (food); to fill up; to prescribe
